Articles.Content:
I often use Dark Multi Player to fly planes and play multiplayer.
When I try to use missiles to take down other players, the only missiles available in KSP's SAS mode are the "aim at target" missiles, which will not hit any moving targets.
Is there any mod that has a feature like targeting the future position of the target?
Also, is it possible to create such a mod?

This statement is output using DeepL

Edited July 2 by ThS5
